title: after 10 update when i went to files app and went to download folder there are .bin files
content: after recieving both the android 10 updates everything is fine and when i went to files app and went to download folder there are some .bin files present and even if i delete them they are appearing again and i'm able to see  the .bin files in download folder even after connecting the phone to pc HERE ARE THE SCREENSHOTS BOTH FROM PHONE AND PC
